title: FlashLight LED 手提電筒 螢幕燈
creator: Eric L H

extendedInfo.description: FlashLight LED v 1.0Most brightness , Fastest, Easiest Flashlight LED##### Work with all droid including "HTC", "LG", "Samsung".....droids#####FlashLight for your droid. It use the back LED of your droid to produce the best experience that you ever had on the Droid.It is super useful to put it always in your pocket.It is FREE!!!!**********************************************FlashLight LED features:@ the Most Brightness@ Fast Start@ Fast Reaction@ Simple Design Function@ Simple Control@ Screen mode with bright white light@ Screen mode with different color, green, purple, red ...@ Can Change intensity of Brightness@ Battery Optimization@ Use Every Time@ Work with all droid including "HTC", "LG", "Samsung".....droids**********************************************Disclaimer: Continued use of the flashlight may dramatically decrease the battery life.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: The best flash light I\'ve ever downloaded, easy to use with quick response, good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fail for Samsung Exhibit 2 4G
reviews.comment: When I go to the camera flashlight setting it tells me my phone does not have a \"camera flash LED.\" It tells me my phone doesn\'t have something that every smart phone made within a year has to my knowledge. A not dumb app for a not so smart phone.
reviews.author: A Google User
